description: This is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) to provide Heavy Equipment Rental Services to the Department of National Defense (DND) on an as and when required basis.
full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer: Heavy Equipment Rentals**
==============================================

** Tender Information **

* **Title:** W0501-24M043 B - MISR - Heavy Equipment Rentals
* **Reference Number:** WS4314552017-Doc4461663134
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4314552017
* **Publication Date:** 2024-02-26
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-12T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-03-05
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Genevieve Petten (she/her)
	+ Email: [genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice Details**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Various international trade agreements, including Canada-Chile FTA, WTO GPA, CPTPP, and more.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada

**Tender Description**

The Government of Canada seeks offers from bidders to provide Heavy Equipment Rental Services on an “as and when” required basis to the Department of National Defence (DND). This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number W0501-24M043/A dated January 22, 2024. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days of receiving notification of their bid's outcome. 

Please note that the full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments are accessible only when logged into your SAP Ariba account and your Government of Canada profile is complete.

**Accessibility and Language**

This procurement office offers procurement services in both English and French. To participate in this tender opportunity, you must meet the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP). For any questions or concerns, please contact the contracting authority, Genevieve Petten, at the above email address.
